1.name: Scratch
1.effect: Scratch the opponent with sharp claws.

2.name: Tackle
2.effect: Charge at the opponent with a full-body tackle.

3.name: Spare
3.effect: Attack the opponent in restrain to prevent the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

4.name: Quick Strike
4.effect: Lunges at the opponent quickly before the target can react. This move has a +1 priority.

5.name: Bite
5.effect: Bite the opponent with vicious fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat.

6.name: Tail Slap
6.effect: Slap the opponent with a tail. This move has a 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.

7.name: Horn Attack
7.effect: Jab at the opponent with a sharply pointed horn. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Attack stat.

8.name: Double Slap
8.effect: Slap the opponent twice in one turn.

9.name: Decisive Strike
9.effect: Look for an oponening and strike consistently. This move ignores the stat changes on the opponent.

10.name: Flurry Strike
10.effect: Strike the opponent in a flurry. Hit 2-5 times in one turn.

11.name: Flail
11.effect: Flail around and aimlessly attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

12.name: Headbutt
12.effect: Recklessly headbutt the opponent that also hurt the user by a quarter of the damage dealt. This move also has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

13.name: Dizzy Punch
13.effect: Hit the opponent with a rhythmically punch. This move also has a 10% chance of leaving the target confused.

14.name: Crush Claw
14.effect: Slash the opponent with hard and sharp claws. This move also lowers the target's Defense stat.

15.name: Body Slam
15.effect: Crash into your opponent with a full-body tackle. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with paralysis.

16.name: Take Down
16.effect: Recklessly slam into the opponent but also hurt the user by a quarter of the damage dealt. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

17.name: Retaliate
17.effect: Revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is doubled if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.

18.name: Rough Combat
18.effect: Fight the opponent up close with a rough style. This move lowers the user's Defense if used in succession.

19.name: Reckless Charge
19.effect: Recklessly rush and tackle the opponent. If this move lands and the opponent loses HP, the user also gets hurt by a third of the damage dealt.

20.name: Final Act
20.effect: Faint after using this move, even if there is no target.

21.name: Colossal Crash
21.effect: Charge at the opponent using every bit of its power. The user cannot move on the next turn.

22.name: Echo
22.effect: Attack the opponent with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by anyone on the field, its power is boosted.

23.name: Screech
23.effect: Attack the opponent with a screeching sound. This move also lowers the target's Defense stat.

24.name: Snore
24.effect: This move can only be used if the user is asleep. The harsh noise from it also has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

25.name: Ancient Hymn
25.effect: Sing an ancient song that shakes the opponent's heart. This move also has a 10% chance to induce sleep.

26.name: Weather Orb
26.effect: This move's type and power change depending on the weather. The move's type changes to ice during hail, water during rain, earth during sandstorm, fire during sunny day and the power doubles under any of these weather conditions.

27.name: Hidden Power
27.effect: Damage the opponent with a mysterious power. This move changes type to deal supereffective damage to the target.

28.name: Sonic Boom
28.effect: Release a destructive sound wave that shocks the opponent.

29.name: Outcry
29.effect: Attack in an uproar for 2 turns. During that time, no one can fall asleep, and those who are already asleep on the battle will be woken up.

30.name: Boomburst
30.effect: Attack everything around the user with the destructive power of explosive sound.

31.name: Super Nova
31.effect: Attack the opponent with a powerful and destructive blast. The user cannot move on the next turn.

32.name: Dodge
32.effect: Dodge upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

33.name: Guard
33.effect: Guard upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

34.name: Rest
34.effect: Rest for 2 turns. Each turn restores the user's HP by 50% and Stamina by 25%. This move also removes all status condition.

35.name: Tickle
35.effect: Tickle the target into laughing, lowering its Special Defense stat.

36.name: Confide
36.effect: Tell the opponent a secret and make the target loses its ability to concentrate. This move lowers the target's Special Attack stat.

37.name: Constrict
37.effect: Use strategical position to restrict the moving space of the opponent. This move lowers the target's Speed stat.

38.name: Growl
38.effect: Let out a growl that lowers the opponent(s)' Attack stats.

39.name: Leer
39.effect: Give out an intimidating leer that lowers the opponent(s)' Defense stats.

40.name: Howl
40.effect: Howl to increase the spirit, raising the user's Attack stat.

41.name: Withdraw
41.effect: Withdraw into a hard shell, raising the user's Defense stat.

42.name: Accelerate
42.effect: Accelerate to boost the user's Speed stat.

43.name: Copycat
43.effect: Copy the move used immediately before the user. If no moves have been used, this move will fail.

44.name: Shield
44.effect: Create a shield to reduce damage from physical attacks for 5 turns.

45.name: Barrier
45.effect: Create a barrier to reduce damage from special attacks for 5 turns.

46.name: Muscle Up
46.effect: Tense the muscles to bulk up the body. This move raises the user's Attack stat and Defense stat.

47.name: Battle Dance
47.effect: Uplift the fighting spirit with a battle dance. This move boosts the user's Attack stat and Speed stat.

48.name: Rallying Cry
48.effect: Let out a powerful cry to uplift the spirit. This move sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

49.name: Shell Break
49.effect: Break out of the shell to drastically raise the user's Speed stat, but lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense stats.

50.name: Endow
50.effect: Switch place with an ally in waiting and pass along any stat changes.

51.name: Bind
51.effect: Bind down the opponent to prevent the target from fleeing. The user also cannot switch.

52.name: Endure
52.effect: Survive any attack during this turn with at least 1 HP, but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

53.name: Assist
53.effect: Assist an ally by boosting the power if that ally's attack in the same turn. This move has a +5 priority.

54.name: Roar
54.effect: Scare off the target, causing a different opponent to be dragged out.

55.name: Substitute
55.effect: Create a substitute using a quarter of HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

56.name: Sing
56.effect: Sing a soothing lullbaby to put the opponent to sleep.

57.name: Recover
57.effect: Regenerate the cells to restore own HP by up to half of the max HP.

58.name: Refresh
58.effect: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, burn, freeze or paralysis.

59.name: Pester
59.effect: The user swarms the opponent(s), lowering their Special Attack stats.

60.name: String Shot
60.effect: Bound the target with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the target's Speed stat.

61.name: Bug Buzz
61.effect: Generate a damaging sound wave by vibration. This move has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense stat.
